comment: I absolutely love this prof..... his tests were exactly like the reviews and the lectures were clear and thorough. If you attend all his lectures theres no way you cant pass his course
The best accounting professor at QCC! Very clear on his lectures and gives bonus points for answering questions. He also gives a clear review of his exams.
QCC BU101-Best professor ever! Very encouraging and will make sure you understand before moving on. He is simply the best.

QCC-Not only is he extremely qualified (MBA and CPA), he logically breaks down the subject matters to an easily understandable science. He goes step by step and literally will not finish with a concept until both you and the rest of the class completely understand it. Difficulty is a 2 because if you listen to him in class you hardly need to study.

Professor McDonald will make sure that you are involved in his lectures.  Bonus Points are given out for correct answers and participation so GO TO CLASS!  HW was easy and the tests are what will decide your final grade.  Just fight for those bonus points and coast through the semester.

There isn't anything I can say bad about this teacher. Whether or not your major is accounting, you NEED to take his class if you are required to take the class. He doesn't give help until you ask, but when you do he will make sure you don't leave until you understand. His classes go by fast because his passion is inspiring. Highly recommend him!!!

Professor McDonald is amazing!! Go to class, do your homework and you should get ATLEAST a B. Know your stuff and answer his tough questions to get extra credit. My only regret was not trying to answer questions- missed an A by one point. Awesome teacher though!

He is the man! He gives everyone a huge opportunity to pass with extra credit! I seriously thought I was going to end up with a "D" or "C" because I struggled with his tests, but I got a "B" in his class!! Show up to class everyday, get extra credit, ask him for help outside of class and do well on the homework. Take him, you won't regret it!
Best teacher ever! I had an A in this class before the final. He is awesome and funny, he helped out with everything.

I went to class the first 2 session and then just came for the exams and final. Did the HW, and didn't study once and came out with an B in the course. He does call on people who are shy...which I hated! Other than that, take him!

I had McDonald for Accounting I at Valdosta State. BEST PROFESSOR EVER. Extremely thorough. Does everything he can to help. If you show up and pay attention there is absolutely no way you can't earn at least a B. I would recommend him a thousand times over. He will put you on the spot, but unless you are extremely shy it shouldn't bother you.

This is the easiest class I have taken so far! MAKE SURE TO BE THERE ON REVIEW DAYS! He basically tells you whats on the test! Do the homework and be there on review days to make an A! Gives out lot of extra credit for answering "difficult" questions!

This teacher was great. I took the summer 8 week session and got an A in a subject I struggled with before. I would recommend him if you need this class. HW was easy and almost 1/2 of your grade. Bonus points for answering certain questions. Exams were easy especially after going to his exam review where he goes over all the questions before.

Professor McDonald is an amazing professor. One of the best teaching methods I've seen at KSU. He likes to call on people in class, but this only makes you want to study and understand the material so you dont look dumb when you get called out. Very fun class, and very fair teacher.

Awesome. Best teacher ever. He is funny and only likes you to answer a question if he calls on you..take him! And go to class! He covers the test thoroughly and you honestly have no reason to make anything less than a B.

McDonald has a sense of humor and makes comments that are funny and keep you awake and paying attention. He does a good job in making sure people know the information and tells you exactly what to write down when it gets important. He's also really understanding when it comes to homework, etc.

1000 points total, 500 for homework(its easy to get all 500), 500 for test. Summer semester had a mid-term and final only. Add 50 possible bonus points to 500 HW points and you only need to average a 70 on tests to make your A. Talks fast and looks for shy/quite people to call on. If feelings hurt easily or shy don't take. Otherwise he is good.

Great professor! I took him over the summer and I loved it! Very entertaining and makes the material easy to understand. If you attend class, do connect assignments, and study you will be fine. I hate accounting and earned a B!

Amazing professor. I took his summer course and I enjoyed going to class everyday. You must study and take notes in class, but you are guaranteed an A or B if you go to class and pay attention. He keeps the class interesting and jokes around with the class. Could not give enough praise!!!

He's great. Show up to class. Take notes and pay attention. The book is almost not necessary. Be prepared to know everything he talks about because it will come back. Also he will full name call you out if he thinks you don't get it or aren't paying attention. If your shy he may not be your guy. But I'd take him again.

Fantastic teacher. In all honesty, I attended almost every class and still had trouble understanding the subject matter. He's extremely adept @ reading his students and make sure that all content is clearly understood. Great professor and looks out for his students. Very blunt and to the point so if you're sensitive, you might want to steer clear.

Prof. McDonald is an incredible teacher. He takes an otherwise dull, dry class and makes it entertaining while keeping you on your toes by throwing out questions (but gives bonus points for correct answers). Attendance and text is a must, but HW is relatively easy and half your grade. He genuinely wants to see his students succeed!

Class isn't required but you should go bc the guy is hilarious and he gives bonus points for answering questions. I didn't buy the book but studied my notes and I'm going into the final with an A. If he taught acct2200 I'd be there for that one too. Best teacher I've had so far.
The best lecturer i have had at ksu, i took acct before and got an F.. now i am getting an A.. i cant begin to explain how awesome he is.. You dont take him you missing out big time.
50% of your grade is from your hw. His test are a little challenging, but if you study and take notes you should be fine. Great teacher overall.
if you do not get an A in this guy's class you should drop out of school.

This class is really entertaining. The homework (on Connect) counts a lot, but it's pretty easy. He gives bonus points in class almost every day when you answer questions. The tests come from the lectures, so it's not too bad. He makes the class really fun, and he is hilarious. He's always willing to help and responds to emails quickly. Take him!
Knows his stuff!  He's a practicing CPA.  Good personality.  Gives extra credit for answering questions in class.  Do online homework!!!  Easy A.

This was an amazing proff who made class execting and ackward. The way he taught was easy to understand but test, you had to know your stuff and read the entire question b/c he like to trick you. Homework was 50% of final grade, as long as you did the HW and paid attention very easy class. attendens isn't manditory but encouraged for extra credit
McDonald is a great teacher. The best time to take him is in the summer. He shortens the workload up.

The man was a godsend. He is wonderful and I learned more from his class than any class I've had yet. The final and midterm were easy if you take your time and do not panic. Keep up on the homework and take good notes and you will do wonderfully. There isn't enough room here to express just how awesome he and his class was. Best teacher I've ever h
Summer course.  Homework was 50% of the final grade.  Says he won't change dates but he was always opening assignments back up after the due dates. Midterm and final were easy. Class was always fun.

Best teacher I have ever had at Kennesaw State University so far. He is an exceptional teacher and the best part I still remember everything he has taught me. If you want a highly effective teacher then I recommend Alfred.
As easy as it gets. The homework counts as 50% of final grade. Take this class.

Going into this class I was discouraged with how I did in past accounting classes.  Professor McDonald is a great professor!  He is absolutely hilarious and I left this class with a full understanding of basic financial accounting skills.  Homework is relevant and contributes to grading.  Study guides are just like tests.  Highly recommend him!

One of the best professors i ever had...knows his stuff....a little hard to understand because of his accent....if u r sensitive stay away cause he is not a shy guy other than that he is very cool...I would definately recommend u to take him

Best professor yet at Kennesaw.  He is hilarious and really knows his subject.  The book is very helpful for the online homework.  Homework is 50% of your grade and there was a midterm and a final.  He gives plenty of extra credit points throughout the class.  Just be ready and open for his class because he is not shy.
I thought he was the coolest professor I had this semester, but I am an Accounting major who loves Accounting. I would recommend him, but do go to class and you will need the book.

Mr. McDonald loves accounting! He is very boisterous and loves to go off on tangents. The text book is a must because he does not create his own hwk assignments or tests...the department does (and he always complains about that...so funny) But overall he makes the material easy to understand and he loves to get his students to think and discuss
